title: Epic: Create insight-mobile with full desktop parity
description: Create a fresh Expo React Native app called insight-mobile with full feature parity to the desktop app (25 screens). Tech stack: Expo SDK 54+, TypeScript, NativeWind, Supabase, AsyncStorage.

title: Phase 1: Foundation - Initialize Expo, auth, theme, storage
description:
Initialize fresh Expo project at apps/insight-mobile with:
- Expo SDK 54+ with Expo Router
- NativeWind for Tailwind styling  
- Supabase client setup
- Auth flow (email + OAuth)
- Theme system (light/dark)
- AsyncStorage layer with sync queue
- Basic app structure and navigation

Reference: /apps/mobile4 for patterns, /packages/shared for types

title: Phase 2: Core Screens - Dashboard, tasks, events, voice
description:

- Dashboard with widgets, heatmaps, active session banner

- Event list and detail screens
